quizTitle: Controlling as a Function of Management Quiz

questions.question: What is the first step in the controlling process?

options.d: Comparison between performance and set standards

questions.question: Why is communication important in the directing function?

options.b: To exchange information and align tasks

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an element of direction?
Which of the following is the primary goal of controlling?

options.b: To ensure objectives are achieved efficiently and effectively

questions.question: What action should be taken when performance deviates from established standards?

options.b: Correct the deviation and implement corrective actions
options.d: Change the goals of the organization
